Communication.Input: Hello I am/myself physiotherapy student. Can I take you as my case? I will ask you few questions regarding your diseases and examine accordingly.
Whats is your name
What is your age
Where do you stay/address/residence/village/town?
What is your education?
What is your occupation?
What is your marital status/married?
What is your religion?
What is your chief complaint?
Communication.Output: came to this hospital because of difficulty of breathing.

Communication.Input: When were you staredt/experienced /first short of breath (at exercise or at rest)?
Communication.Output: I used to get breathless while doing heavy farmer work but since last 2 years it has gradually increased and now I am short of breath at rest also.

Communication.Input: How long /since/days/months/weeks have you been short of breath? Is it getting worse?
Communication.Output: Since last 15 days i get breathless after doing activities of daily living

Communication.Input: What are the factors thatincrease /Aggravates your Shortness of breath/breathlessness?
Communication.Output: Since 15 days little difficulty in doing Activies of Daily living before that stop for breath after walking 100m

Communication.Input: What are the exaggerate/aggravating /increases and settle /relievingfactors for cough?
Do you have complain of cough ,How frequently and when do you cough?
Communication.Output: Yes. Increased since last 15 days. But usually there on and off since last 3 to 4 years.

Communication.Input: Is it getting worse?
Do you cough mucus?
Do you cough sputum?
What is the quality, consistency and colour of sputum?
Do you have difficulty in doing Activities of daily living/ household chores/personal care/daily rountine work?
Do you have chest tightness
Do you have loss of appetite
Do you have loss of weight?
Do you have blood in sputum or while coughing/hemoptysis?
Do you have chest pain?
Do you get breathless in lying down position?
Do you feel your heart beat/palpitation?
Do you feel your heart beat/palpitation?
Do you feel sudden short of breath /breathlessness during sleep?
DO you have similar complains in past few years and any hospital admission for the same?
Communication.Output: No hospital admissionsas but i used to get breathless and used to visit the local physician and symptoms used to get relieved.

Communication.Input: Do you have history of TB, asthma, DM and HTN
What is you diet veg or non veg?
Do you have any addiction
Do you have any issue with passing stool emptying stomach/ and urine
Do you have any allergy to household dust
Communication.Output: while working on farm fields and cold air some times

Communication.Input: Are you on any medications
Communication.Output: not on regular basis. took in past and discontinues as symptoms settled down. now as prescribed by doctors

Communication.Input: Any family member ever had history of TB, Other respiratory disease or similar complaints
Do you have any exposure to airborn irritants such as chemical and dust in jobs?
Do you have any childhood history of respiratory illness?
